amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available under this Act, may be used in contravention of the Defense of Marriage Act (Public Law 104-199).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of the Defense of Marriage Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 171 (Roll no. 235).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 171 (Roll no. 235).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Mr. Huelskamp.
